data.title: Regent University: Costs, Jobs, Bar Results
data.meta_description: Regent University overview on law school tuition, debt, salaries, enrollment, lawyer jobs, bar pass rates, and more. Regent University currently enrolls a total of 332 students in their JD program. With an acceptance rate of 40.9%, they welcomed 112 new 1Ls in 2023 with a median LSAT of 157. Tuition and fees are $41.6k annually. Cost of living is estimated at $30.5k.
